name: Forceful4
short_description:
Forceful4 is a 4-in-a-row easy to handle, easy to travel, easy to play game.

 With Forceful4, you can choose to play three game modes:
 -Multiplayer Local
 -Multiplayer Online
 -Singleplayer

 With the first one, you can play with a friend on the same computer and count the maximum score you can reach!

 The multiplayer online make you face an enemy on the web using it's matchmaking mode.
 Finally, if you want to stay alone, play against your computer using the singleplayer mode.

 Forceful4 has a great GUI, auto-updater manager and a full online support, this make this 4-in-a-row best experience you've ever seen!
summary: Are you forceful enough to win this 4-in-a-row game ?
